verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* those \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w that|strong="G1565"\w* there went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* a \w decree|strong="G1378"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w* \w Augustus|strong="G0828"\w*, that \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w* should be \w taxed|strong="G0583"\w*.

(\add And\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w taxing|strong="G0582"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* made \w when|strong="G1096"\w* \w Cyrenius|strong="G2958"\w* was \w governor|strong="G2230"\w* of \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*.)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* to be \w taxed|strong="G0583"\w*, every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w*; (\w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lineage|strong="G3965"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*:)

To be \w taxed|strong="G0583"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w espoused|strong="G3423"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* great with \w child|strong="G1471"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* so it \w was|strong="G1096"\w*, that, \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1511"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* were \w accomplished|strong="G4130"\w* that \w she|strong="G0846"\w* should be \w delivered|strong="G5088"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* she brought \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrapped|strong="G4683"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* in swaddling \w clothes|strong="G4683"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G0347"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w manger|strong="G5336"\w*; \w because|strong="G1360"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w room|strong="G5117"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w inn|strong="G2646"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w country|strong="G5561"\w* \w shepherds|strong="G4166"\w* abiding in the \w field|strong="G0063"\w*, \w keeping|strong="G5442"\w* \w watch|strong="G5438"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w flock|strong="G4167"\w* by \w night|strong="G3571"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* came \w upon|strong="G2186"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shone round \w about|strong="G4034"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G5399"\w* \w sore|strong="G3173"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w bring|strong="G2097"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* good \w tidings|strong="G2097"\w* \w of|strong="G5479"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w to|strong="G2992"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* is \w born|strong="G5088"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w* a \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*; Ye shall \w find|strong="G2147"\w* the \w babe|strong="G1025"\w* wrapped in swaddling \w clothes|strong="G4683"\w*, \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w manger|strong="G5336"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G1810"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* a \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of the \w heavenly|strong="G3770"\w* \w host|strong="G4756"\w* \w praising|strong="G0134"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Glory|strong="G1391"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w highest|strong="G5310"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, good \w will|strong="G2107"\w* \w toward|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* were gone \w away|strong="G0565"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, the \w shepherds|strong="G4166"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, Let \w us|strong="G1330"\w* \w now|strong="G1211"\w* \w go|strong="G1330"\w* even \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="G0965"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w thing|strong="G4487"\w* which is come to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* with \w haste|strong="G4692"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G0429"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w babe|strong="G1025"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w manger|strong="G5336"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they made \w known|strong="G1232"\w* \w abroad|strong="G4012"\w* the \w saying|strong="G4487"\w* which was \w told|strong="G2980"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w child|strong="G3813"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* they that \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add* \w wondered|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G4012"\w* those things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w told|strong="G2980"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* the \w shepherds|strong="G4166"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w kept|strong="G4933"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w things|strong="G4487"\w*, and \w pondered|strong="G4820"\w* \add them\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w shepherds|strong="G4166"\w* \w returned|strong="G1994"\w*, \w glorifying|strong="G1392"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praising|strong="G0134"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the things \w that|strong="G3739"\w* they had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it was \w told|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* were \w accomplished|strong="G4130"\w* for the \w circumcising|strong="G4059"\w* of the \w child|strong="G3813"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w*, which was so \w named|strong="G2564"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w conceived|strong="G4815"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w womb|strong="G2836"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2512"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w purification|strong="G2512"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* were \w accomplished|strong="G4130"\w*, they \w brought|strong="G0321"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, to \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \add him\add* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*;

(\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w male|strong="G0730"\w* that \w openeth|strong="G1272"\w* the \w womb|strong="G3388"\w* shall be \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*;)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w offer|strong="G1325"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* that which is \w said|strong="G2046"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, A \w pair|strong="G2201"\w* of \w turtledoves|strong="G5167"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w young|strong="G3502"\w* \w pigeons|strong="G4058"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \add was\add* \w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \add was\add* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w devout|strong="G2126"\w*, \w waiting|strong="G4327"\w* for the \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w revealed|strong="G5537"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, that he \w should|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G5547"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="G2962"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* the \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* brought \w in|strong="G1521"\w* the \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w custom|strong="G1480"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G1209"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1209"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w arms|strong="G0043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*,

\w Lord|strong="G1203"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* lettest \w thou|strong="G0630"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w depart|strong="G0630"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w*:
\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* have \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w*,
\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w before|strong="G2596"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*;

A \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w lighten|strong="G0602"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2992"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* those things which were \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simeon|strong="G4826"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \add child\add* is \w set|strong="G2749"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fall|strong="G4431"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* rising \w again|strong="G0386"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* a \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* which shall be spoken \w against|strong="G0483"\w*;

(\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, a \w sword|strong="G4501"\w* shall pierce \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*,) \w that|strong="G3704"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="G1261"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* may be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* one \w Anna|strong="G0451"\w*, a \w prophetess|strong="G4398"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w* of \w Phanuel|strong="G5323"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* of \w Aser|strong="G0768"\w*: \w she|strong="G0846"\w* was \w of|strong="G4260"\w* a \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w age|strong="G4260"\w*, and had \w lived|strong="G2198"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* an \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w virginity|strong="G3932"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \add was\add* a \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* of \w about|strong="G5613"\w* fourscore and \w four|strong="G3589"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w departed|strong="G0868"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, but \w served|strong="G3000"\w* \add God\add* with \w fastings|strong="G3521"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayers|strong="G1162"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* coming \w in|strong="G2186"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w instant|strong="G5610"\w* gave thanks \w likewise|strong="G0437"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w looked|strong="G4327"\w* for \w redemption|strong="G3085"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* they had \w performed|strong="G5055"\w* all \w things|strong="G0537"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, they \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w grew|strong="G0837"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* waxed \w strong|strong="G2901"\w* in \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* with \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w year|strong="G2094"\w* at the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* of the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* years \w old|strong="G2094"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w custom|strong="G1485"\w* of the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w fulfilled|strong="G5048"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w returned|strong="G5290"\w*, the \w child|strong="G3816"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* tarried \w behind|strong="G5278"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add of it\add*.
